question: Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding Central Information Commission? 1.It is a statutory body. 2.It has a jurisdiction over Central Government Bodies, PSU and MNCs working in India. 3.It was constituted through an Official Gazette Notification under the provisions of the Right to Information Act (2005). Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Central Information Commission (CIC) is set up under the Right to Information Act. It is a quasi judicial body.CIC hears appeals from information- seekers who have not been satisfied by the public authority, and also addresses major issues concerning the RTI Act.
